properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v3 v4 v5 v3 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Give all your best
God is expecting
Don't waste your chance to be blessed by Him

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Today is our chance
There's no repeating
We can't recapture the wasted years

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
So give it right this time
Honor God through our offering
Don't make Him sad this time
It's our loss not His

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
His Words are true
Believe them in faith
Blessings He promises
To them who obey

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
He's given His all
What then have we given
It's not time to waiver
No time to delay

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
So give it right this time
Honor God through our offering
Don't make Him sad this time
It's our loss not His
So give it right this time,
this time.
